compiler.description: The compiler name as specified in `pclp_config.py' --list-compiler`

compiler-options.description: A space separated list of base compiler options. If you are targeting an architecture other than the compilerâ€™s default, you should include the option that specifies the target architecture when generating a compiler configuration to ensure the correct values for size options in the generated configuration. Compiler options specified with this option are applied when the compiler is invoked in either C or C++ mode.

compiler-c-options.description: Similar to `compiler-options` but only used when invoking the compiler in C mode. Use for C-only language options such as setting the language version.

compiler-cpp-options.description: Similar to `compiler-options` but only used when invoking the compiler in C++ mode. Use for C++-only language options such as setting the language version.
